alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 145 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chambers Estates, or near Hollywood, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Cooper City, West Park, Ravenswood Estates, St. George, Estates Of Fort Lauderdale, Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport, Chambers Estates, Pine Island Ridge and Downtown Fort Lauderdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
